items.sentence: Driving is not something that I enjoy doing.
Tom was the one who suggested we drive here.
What are three skills that you wish you had?
I'm very excited about my trip to Australia.
Tom saw Mary sitting on her porch with John.
It's been three years since I've been there.
Tom noticed a scruffy old dog following him.
Why don't we do it like we did it yesterday?
Tom has been invited to sing with the choir.
That isn't something I thought I'd ever say.
Tom knew that Mary expected him to kiss her.
Tom was often made fun of when he was a kid.
No one on board the sinking ship could swim.
Tom is certain that he's going to get fired.
Tom will be allowed to do whatever he wants.
It's the best French restaurant in New York.
Tom's height makes him stand out in a crowd.
I never learned about any of this in school.
I hope we'll be seeing you around here soon.
I don't know why my friend wants us to wait.
